title: Chocolate fondant puddings with lime syrup and coconut custard
description: A chocoholic's delight, these decadent desserts deserve the 'oohs' and 'aahs' they'll receive at the dinner table.
ingredients: 150g/5oz plain chocolate, minimum 70% cocoa solids, broken into pieces
1 lime, zest and juice, plus 1 lime, juice only
clotted cream, crème fraiche or vanilla ice cream, to serve
